title: naadhupai balikEru
sahitya:
nAdupai balikEru narulu vEdasannuta bhavamu vEru jEsiti nanucu



caraNam 1



 panca sara janaka prapancamuna gala sukhamu mancuvale nanucu madi nencitini  

gAni pancukoni dhana mularjincukoni sariyevvarancu mari gatiyu lEdanucu balkitinA 

   

caraNam 2



 dinamu nityOtsavamuna kAsa jenditi nA manasuna illu okaTiyani yuNTigAni 

anudinamu nOrula mElanu jUci tALalEkanu reNDu sEyavale nanucu balkitinA

   

caraNam 3



 prANamE pAtiyani mAnamE mElaNTi gAni shrI rAma paramAnanda jaladhi 

shrInAtha kulamulO lEni dArani baTTi jAnEDudaramu nimpa norula pogaDitinA

   

caraNam 4



 AjAnubhAyua shrI jAnakIpati payOkSa shrI tyAgarAjanuta caraNa 

I jagatilO ninnu pUjincuvAri navyAjamuna brOcu surAja nI vADaina
